panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: http-router Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="http-router"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="http-router"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="http-router"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="http-router"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="http-router"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="http-router"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="http-router"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="http-router"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="http-router"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: worker_requests SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of request that are flowing through the `http-router`.

Errors on this SLI may indicate issues within the deployed `http-router`
codebase as errors are limited to those originating inside of the worker.

See: https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/blob/master/docs/http-router/logging.md?ref_type=heads



### Observability Tools

* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker live logs: production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/live-logs/production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production)
* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker historical logs: production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/view/production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production/observability/logs)
* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker historical error logs: production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/view/production-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production/observability/logs?filters=%5B%7B%22key%22%3A%22%24cloudflare.%24metadata.error%22%2C%22operation%22%3A%22EXISTS%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22string%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D)
* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker live logs: staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/live-logs/staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production)
* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker historical logs: staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/view/staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production/observability/logs)
* [üìñ Cloudflare Worker historical error logs: staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router](https://dash.cloudflare.com/852e9d53d0f8adbd9205389356f2303d/workers/services/view/staging-gitlab-com-cells-http-router/production/observability/logs?filters=%5B%7B%22key%22%3A%22%24cloudflare.%24metadata.error%22%2C%22operation%22%3A%22EXISTS%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22string%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D)
panels.title: Details

panels.description:
Maximum HTTP Router CPU time spent on any request for the fastest 99.9% of requests.

The more time on the CPU we spend the more latency the HTTP Router is adding to every request.
This also has a direct impact on [cost](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/platform/pricing/#workers) for HTTP Router.

For profiling a worker follow https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/observability/dev-tools/cpu-usage/
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, tier, type, stage, shard, script_name) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      max_over_time(cloudflare_worker_cpu_time{quantile="P999", env="$environment",environment="$environment",type="http-router"}[1m]) / (50 * 1000)
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: http_router_cpu component saturation: HTTP Router CPU P999 Budget
